description: The REFERRAL_CVG table contains coverage information for referrals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral in database.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: A line number that is used to identify a group of coverage-related information. For example, if a referral has 2 valid coverages, line 1 of the coverage items contains the information about the first coverage, line 2 contains the information about the second coverage.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The ID of a coverage that is valid for the referral.

columns.name: CVG_USED_YN
columns.description:
A yes/no flag that indicates whether or not the coverage should be considered available for the referral use in non-UM (utilization management) workflows. For UM workflows, consider using SUBMITTED_UM_AUTHS_YN.  The coverage may be valid on the dates, but still inappropriate to use. Setting the flag to Yes means that the coverage is all right to use.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: AUTH_REQUIRED_YN
columns.description: A flag to indicate whether the coverage requires external authorization to be received (as from an insurance carrier) for the services.

columns.name: CARRIER_AUTH_CMT
columns.description: The carrier authorization number or comment, indicating that authorization was received.

columns.name: EFF_CVG_PRECERT_NUM
columns.description: Precertification number associated with a coverage on a referral.

columns.name: EFF_CVG_AUTH_CMT
columns.description: Comments regarding authorization specific to a coverage used on a referral.

columns.name: CVG_INVALID_FLAG
columns.description: Flag for invalid coverage for non-UM (utilization management) workflows.

columns.name: CHARGE_COUNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of charges that this service level authorization record counts for professional, technical or all charges.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Only Professional Charges


Only Technical Charges


All Charges

columns.name: USE_CHARGE_COUNT_YN
columns.description:
Flag to specify if the referral & coverage are using charge counting.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CHARGE_COUNT_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Charge counting method for this service level authorization.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge Quantity


Each Charge

columns.name: CVG_SVC_TYPE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the service type at the coverage level.


May contain organization-specific values: No
